resource.chars:
present paper connected 
with those of the two 
former papers which the 
Council have done me 
the honor to place amongst 
their Archives -
<u>First<\u> I have established 
the fact that air gradually 
insinuates itself into the 
best made Barometers of 
the usual construction 
<u>Secondly<\u> - I have shewn 
that this cannot take 
place by means of any 
solution of the air in the 
metal 
<u>Thirdly<\u> - I have proved 
that the passage of the 
air is between the Mercury 
& the glass 
<u>Lastly<\u> - I have invented
